article.Heading: Inside Chhattisgarh: Powering the rural landscape
article.Summary: As part of a Budget special edition of what's ailing rural India, CNBC TV18's Archana Shukla travels to some of the villages in tribal, naxal affected parts of Chhattisgarh that are just about being connected and those still living in the dark ages.
article.Body:
Two months ago - Khudsanar village in Chhattisgarh finally made it on India's power map. This was part of the central governments rural electrification programme that is aimed at electrying 13,000 villages by 2017. The program is trying to overcome the challenge of reaching high cost infrastructure to small settlements. As part of a Budget special edition of what's ailing rural India, CNBC TV18's Archana Shukla travels to some of these villages in tribal, naxal affected parts of Chhattisgarh that are just about being connected and those still living in the dark ages.

Watch video for more....
